snippet: A proposal by the United States and New Zealand to create a huge ocean reserve in Antarctic waters has been sharply reduced after opposition from Russia and other nations with large fishing industries.
abstract: Proposal by United States and New Zealand to create a huge ocean reserve in Antarctic waters is sharply reduced in scale after opposition from Russia and other nations with large fishing industries; environmentalists warn that the ambitious project is being badly undermined.
lead_paragraph: A proposal by the United States and New Zealand to create a huge ocean reserve in Antarctic waters has been sharply reduced after opposition from Russia and other nations with large fishing industries.

headline.main: Proposal to Protect Antarctic Waters Is Scaled Back
headline.print_headline: Proposal to Protect Antarctic Waters Is Scaled Back

keywords.value: Commission for the Conservation of Antarctic Marine Living Resources
keywords.name: organizations
